title: Bugsplat.dll is missing?
body: Whenever i try to open my league client, an error pops up saying "bugsplat.dll is missing" and even though i look into the files, and its right there tiltled "bugsplat.dll", of course. I uninstalled and reinstalled to see if that would help and it didn't. Can anyone help me? I wanna do meh promos but i cant if i have to wait a half hour to install the game every time :(

replies.body: This happened to me, i searched around and found this. http://www.dll4free.com/bugsplat.dll.html and i replaced it. It actually worked for me. I don't know about you. I am praying it does for you as well! :)

I found out why it was doing it, So basically i have a SSD and a HDD, I installed league on my HDD and made a new folder called League, Installed it on there, So when i open up my league from desktop it says im missing dlls, Because i have windows on my SSD and League on my HDD. So just go in your league folder and launch the game from inside the folder. Or when you find the launcher in your league folder right click the launcher, Create shortcut then move the shortcut on your desktop. And Bam. Hope this helps.

This issue can be caused for a few reasons, the most common being a corrupted update.  It's not always the case though, as it could actually be a permissions problem with your PC that's blocking access to a game file.  Start out with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if it does the trick!
I'm having this bugsplat issue as well is there a fix for it yet? I have tried the permissions guide as well

If permissions didn't resolve this, how about a clean reinstall with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)?  It's a step in the permissions guide, but should help in case of missing files.  Let me know.

I can confirm that the hextech repair tool works, i did the reinstall (recommended) and then toggle on the "Clean uninstall (not recommended) works perfectly, i did not have the problem with the "Bugsplat.dll" file missing any longer. 

Thank you very much Porocles, was really helpful
I have the same problem. I've done what you recommended but nothing worked. Any other ideas?

i just uninstalled and re installed and didnt download the new client. later i downloaded the new client and it works fine. Not sure what happened but it works now so thats all that matters :)
